00002 #include <mathml/mmldocument.h>

00005 MMLImage::MMLImage() {
00006     m_border = 4;
00007     m_outline = true;
00008     m_mustLayout = true;
00009     m_mustPaint = true;
00010     m_doc = 0;
00011     m_foreground[0] = 0;
00012     m_foreground[1] = 0;
00013     m_foreground[2] = 0;
00014     m_background[0] = 1;
00015     m_background[1] = 1;
00016     m_background[2] = 1;
00017 
00018     m_w = m_h = m_dataw = m_datah = 1;
00019     m_data = 0;
00020     resize(1, 1);
00021 }
00022 MMLImage::~MMLImage() {
00023     delete [] m_data;
00024     cairo_destroy(m_cpainter);
00025     cairo_surface_destroy(m_buffer);
00026 }
00027 void
00028 MMLImage::resize(int w, int h) {
00029     if (m_data) {
00030         cairo_destroy(m_cpainter);
00031         cairo_surface_destroy(m_buffer);
00032         delete [] m_data;
00033     }
00034 
00035     // allocate a buffer
00036     m_data = new unsigned char[m_w*m_h*4];
00037     m_buffer = cairo_image_surface_create_for_data(m_data,
00038         CAIRO_FORMAT_ARGB32, m_w, m_h, 4*m_w);
00039     m_dataw = m_w;
00040     m_datah = m_h;
00041     m_cpainter = cairo_create(m_buffer);
00042     m_painter.setPainter(m_cpainter);
00043 }
00044 void
00045 MMLImage::setDocument(const MMLDocument *doc) {
00046     m_doc = doc;
00047     m_mustLayout = true;
00048 }
00049 void
00050 MMLImage::layout() {
00051     m_doc->setPainter(&m_painter);
00052     m_doc->layout();
00053 
00054     // obtain the dimensions of the document
00055     float ascent = 0;
00056     float height = 0;
00057     float maxwidth = 0;
00058     bool more = true;
00059     int view = 0;
00060     do {
00061         m_doc->setCurrentView(view++);
00062         m_doc->setX(0);
00063         m_doc->setY(height);
00064         more = m_doc->setMaxViewWidth(1000);
00065         ascent += m_doc->getAscent();
00066         height += m_doc->getHeight();
00067         float w = m_doc->getWidth();
00068         if (w > maxwidth) maxwidth = w;
00069     } while (more);
00070     m_ascent = (int)ceil(ascent);
00071     m_w = int(ceil(maxwidth + 2*m_border));
00072     m_h = int(ceil(height + 2*m_border));
00073 
00074     if (m_w > 1000) m_w = 1000;
00075     if (m_h > 1000) m_h = 1000;
00076 
00077     m_mustLayout = false;
00078 }
00079 void
00080 MMLImage::repaint() {
00081     if (m_mustLayout) layout();
00082 
00083     if (m_dataw != m_w || m_datah != m_h) {
00084         resize(m_w, m_h);
00085     }
00086 
00087     // initialize the buffer and painter
00088     cairo_set_source_rgb(m_cpainter, m_background[0], m_background[1],
00089         m_background[2]);
00090     cairo_rectangle(m_cpainter, 0, 0, m_w, m_h);
00091     cairo_fill(m_cpainter);
00092     cairo_set_line_width(m_cpainter, 1);
00093     cairo_set_source_rgb(m_cpainter, m_foreground[0], m_foreground[1],
00094         m_foreground[2]);
00095     cairo_translate(m_cpainter, m_border, m_ascent + m_border);
00096 
00097     // paint all the views below each other
00098     for (ushort i=0; i < m_doc->countViewPorts(); ++i) {
00099         m_doc->setCurrentView(i);
00100         m_doc->paint();
00101     }
00102 
00103     // paint a border
00104     if (m_outline) {
00105 /*        QPen pen = m_qpainter.pen();
00106         pen.setColor(Qt::red);
00107         pen.setWidthF(1);
00108         m_qpainter.setPen(pen);
00109         w -= 2*m_border;
00110         h -= 2*m_border;
00111         m_qpainter.drawRect(QRectF(-0.5, -m_ascent-0.5, w+1, h+1));*/
00112     }
00113 //    m_qpainter.end();
00114 
00115     cairo_translate(m_cpainter, -m_border, -m_ascent - m_border);
00116 
00117     m_mustPaint = false;
00118 }
00119 uchar *
00120 MMLImage::getPixmap() {
00121     if (m_mustLayout || m_mustPaint) repaint();
00122     return m_data;
00123 }
00124 cairo_surface_t*
00125 MMLImage::getSurface() {
00126     if (m_mustLayout || m_mustPaint) repaint();
00127     return m_buffer;
00128 }
00129 void
00130 MMLImage::setFont(const std::string &name, float size) {
00131     if (name != m_fontname || size != m_fontsize) {
00132         m_fontname = name;
00133         m_fontsize = size;
00134         m_mustLayout = true;
00135         m_painter.setFont(name, size);
00136     }
00137 }
00138 void
00139 MMLImage::setBackgroundColor(float r , float g , float b) {
00140     m_background[0] = r;
00141     m_background[1] = g;
00142     m_background[2] = b;
00143     m_painter.setBackground(r*256.0, g*256.0, b*256.0);
00144 }
